java.lang.Object
gui.util.AbstractConfigurePanel

Direct Known Subclasses:
ConfigureConnectionsPanel, ConfigureGatewayPanel, ConfigureMotePanel, ConfigurePathPanel, ConfigureRegionPanel, ConfigureWayPointsPanel, DestinationGUI
public abstract class AbstractConfigurePanel
extends java.lang.Object
implements Refreshable
An abstract class used as a base class for configuration related GUI panels
